languages.text: "Я пыталась научиться доверию к тебе, элантах. Какими бы ни были твои мотивы, ты не отвернул{mf|ся|ась} от меня, помога{mf|л|ла} искать собратьев. Но отчаяние пожирало меня изнутри. Человеческие путешествия сквозь царство Той, Что Жаждет, истощили мою душу, а наши попытки спасти детей Крудараха растворились и стали ничем в вечно холодной тьме космоса. И даже когда я узрела частицу Крудараха в твоих покоях, я хотела верить, что ты ни при чем. Хотела, но... поддалась эмоциям. Страху. Обреченности. Скорби. Я боялась, что Сай'лантреш доберется до меня раньше, чем я доберусь до истины".

traits.locale_text: "Я пыталась научиться доверию к тебе, элантах. Какими бы ни были твои мотивы, ты не отвернул{mf|ся|ась} от меня, помога{mf|л|ла} искать собратьев. Но отчаяние пожирало меня изнутри. Человеческие путешествия сквозь царство Той, Что Жаждет, истощили мою душу, а наши попытки спасти детей Крудараха расстворились и стали ничем в вечнохолодной тьма космоса. И даже когда я узрела частицу Крудараха в твоих покоях, я хотела верить, что ты ни при чем. Хотела, но... поддалась эмоциям. Страху. Обреченности. Скорби. Я боялась, что Сай'лантреш доберется до меня раньше, чем я доберусь до истины".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I tried to learn to trust you, elantach. Whatever your motives, you did not turn away from me, and you helped me search for my kin. But despair ate at me from within. The human journeys through the realm of She Who Thirsts left my soul drained, and our attempts to save the children of Crudarach crumbled to nothing in the unending coldness of the dark cosmos. And even when I beheld a piece of Crudarach in your chambers, I wanted to believe you had nothing to do with it. I wanted to, but... I succumbed to emotion. To fear. To hopelessness. To grief. I was afraid that Sai'lanthresh would find me before I found the truth."
languages.original_text: "Я пыталась научиться доверию к тебе, элантах. Какими бы ни были твои мотивы, ты не отвернул{mf|ся|ась} от меня, помога{mf|л|ла} искать собратьев. Но отчаяние пожирало меня изнутри. Человеческие путешествия сквозь царство Той, Что Жаждет, истощили мою душу, а наши попытки спасти детей Крудараха растворились и стали ничем в вечно холодной тьме космоса. languages.text: “我曾试着学习信任你，外界人。虽然不知道你这么做是出于什么动机，但你从来没有离开过我身边，还一直帮助我寻找我的族人。然而，绝望却从内心吞噬了我。穿越饥渴女士领域的旅程让我的灵魂痛苦不堪，拯救克鲁达拉赫子民的希望，也在黑暗、冰冷的宇宙之中化为乌有。甚至当我看到你的房间里挂着克鲁达拉赫的碎片时，我也想要相信你和这件事情没有任何关系。我确实想这么说服自己……但我却被自己的感情压垮了，我被我的恐惧、绝望、悲伤压垮了。我害怕自己撑不到得知真相的那一天，就会先落入赛·兰斯雷什的魔掌。”
languages.original_text: "I tried to learn to trust you, elantach. Whatever your motives, you did not turn away from me, and you helped me search for my kin. But despair ate at me from within. The human journeys through the realm of She Who Thirsts left my soul drained, and our attempts to save the children of Crudarach crumbled to nothing in the unending coldness of the dark cosmos. And even when I beheld a piece of Crudarach in your chambers, I wanted to believe you had nothing to do with it. I wanted to, but... I succumbed to emotion. To fear. To hopelessness. To grief. I was afraid that Sai'lanthresh would find me before I found the truth."

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «He intentado confiar en ti, elantach. Fueran cuales fueran tus motivos, no me diste la espalda y me ayudaste a buscar a mi pueblo. Pero la desesperación me corroía por dentro. Los viajes humanos por el reino de la Sedienta dejaban agotada mi alma y nuestros intentos de salvar a los hijos de Crudarach eran fútiles ante el infinito frío del oscuro cosmos. Cuando vi un trozo de Crudarach en tus aposentos, quise creer que no habías tenido nada que ver. Quise, pero... sucumbí a las emociones. Al miedo, a la desesperación y al dolor. Temía que Sai'lanthresh me encontrara antes de encontrar yo la verdad».
languages.original_text: "I tried to learn to trust you, elantach. Whatever your motives, you did not turn away from me, and you helped me search for my kin. But despair ate at me from within. The human journeys through the realm of She Who Thirsts left my soul drained, and our attempts to save the children of Crudarach crumbled to nothing in the unending coldness of the dark cosmos. And even when I beheld a piece of Crudarach in your chambers, I wanted to believe you had nothing to do with it. I wanted to, but... I succumbed to emotion. To fear. To hopelessness. To grief. I was afraid that Sai'lanthresh would find me before I found the truth."

Los viajes humanos por el reino de la Sedienta dejaban agotada mi alma y nuestros intentos de salvar a los hijos de Crudarach eran fútiles ante el infinito frío del oscuro cosmos. Cuando vi un trozo de Crudarach en tus aposentos, quise creer que no habías tenido nada que ver. Quise, pero... sucumbí a las emociones. Al miedo, a la desesperación y al dolor. Temía que Sai'lanthresh me encontrara antes de encontrar yo la verdad».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ、私はあなたを信じようとした。動機が何であれ、あなたは私から目を背けず、キンを探すのを手伝ってくれたからだ。だが、絶望は私を内側から蝕んだ。〈かの渇きたる女〉の領域を巡る人間の旅は私の魂を摩耗させ、クルダラの御子らを救おうとした我々の試みは、暗い宇宙の果てなき冷たさの中で無に帰した。あなたの部屋でクルダラの欠片を見たときでさえ、あなたが無関係だと信じたかった。そうしたかったが…私は感情に抗えなかったのだ。恐怖に、絶望に、悲しみに。真実を見つける以上に、セランスレッシュに見つかることが怖かった」
languages.original_text: "I tried to learn to trust you, elantach. Whatever your motives, you did not turn away from me, and you helped me search for my kin. But despair ate at me from within. The human journeys through the realm of She Who Thirsts left my soul drained, and our attempts to save the children of Crudarach crumbled to nothing in the unending coldness of the dark cosmos. And even when I beheld a piece of Crudarach in your chambers, I wanted to believe you had nothing to do with it. I wanted to, but... I succumbed to emotion. To fear. To hopelessness. To grief. I was afraid that Sai'lanthresh would find me before I found the truth."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、私はあなたを信じようとした。動機が何であれ、あなたは私から目を背けず、キンを探すのを手伝ってくれたからだ。だが、絶望は私を内側から蝕んだ。〈かの渇きたる女〉の領域を巡る人間の旅は私の魂を摩耗させ、クルダラの御子らを救おうとした我々の試みは、暗い宇宙の果てなき冷たさの中で無に帰した。あなたの部屋でクルダラの欠片を見たときでさえ、あなたが無関係だと信じたかった。そうしたかったが…私は感情に抗えなかったのだ。恐怖に、絶望に、悲しみに。真実を見つける以上に、セランスレッシュに見つかることが怖かった」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai vraiment essayé d'apprendre à vous faire confiance, elantach. Quelles que soient vos motivations, vous ne m'avez jamais tourné le dos et vous m'avez aidée à chercher mes semblables. Malgré tout, je me suis laissée ronger par le désespoir. Les voyages humains dans le royaume de l'Assoiffée ont épuisé mon âme, et nos efforts pour sauver les enfants de Crudarach ont été réduits à néant dans le froid glacial du cosmos. J'ai voulu croire que vous n'aviez rien à voir avec tout ça, même quand j'ai tenu entre mes mains un fragment de Crudarach dans vos quartiers. J'ai vraiment voulu y croire, mais... j'ai laissé mes émotions prendre le dessus. La peur. Le désespoir. Le chagrin. Je craignais que Sai'lanthresh me trouve avant que je ne découvre la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "I tried to learn to trust you, elantach. Whatever your motives, you did not turn away from me, and you helped me search for my kin. But despair ate at me from within. The human journeys through the realm of She Who Thirsts left my soul drained, and our attempts to save the children of Crudarach crumbled to nothing in the unending coldness of the dark cosmos. And even when I beheld a piece of Crudarach in your chambers, I wanted to believe you had nothing to do with it. I wanted to, but... I succumbed to emotion. To fear. To hopelessness. To grief. I was afraid that Sai'lanthresh would find me before I found the truth."

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe versucht, zu lernen, Euch zu vertrauen, Elantach. Was auch Eure Motive sein mögen, Ihr habt Euch nicht von mir abgewendet, und Ihr habt mir geholfen, mein Volk zu suchen. Doch die Verzweiflung hat mich von innen heraus zerfressen. Die menschlichen Reisen durch das Reich von Ihr, die dürstet, haben meine Seele erschöpft, und unsere Versuche, die Kinder von Crudarach zu retten, sind in der endlosen Kälte des dunklen Kosmos zu Staub zerfallen. Und selbst, als in Euren Gemächern ein Stück von Crudarach gesehen habe, wollte ich glauben, dass Ihr nichts damit zu tun hattet. Ich wollte es, doch ... Ich bin der Emotion erlegen. Der Angst. Der Hoffnungslosigkeit. Der Trauer. Ich hatte Angst, dass Sai'lanthresh mich finden würde, ehe ich die Wahrheit finde."
languages.original_text: "I tried to learn to trust you, elantach. Whatever your motives, you did not turn away from me, and you helped me search for my kin. But despair ate at me from within. The human journeys through the realm of She Who Thirsts left my soul drained, and our attempts to save the children of Crudarach crumbled to nothing in the unending coldness of the dark cosmos. And even when I beheld a piece of Crudarach in your chambers, I wanted to believe you had nothing to do with it. I wanted to, but... I succumbed to emotion. To fear. To hopelessness. To grief. I was afraid that Sai'lanthresh would find me before I found the truth."

And even when I beheld a piece of Crudarach in your chambers, I wanted to believe you had nothing to do with it. I wanted to, but... I succumbed to emotion. To fear. To hopelessness. To grief. I was afraid that Sai'lanthresh would find me before I found the truth."

languages.text: "Sana güvenmeyi öğrenmeye çalıştım elantach. Gerekçelerin ne olursa olsun bana yüz çevirmedin ve soydaşlarımı aramama yardımcı oldun. Ancak bu keder, beni içten içe yiyip bitirdi. İnsanların Susayan'ın diyarına yaptıkları yolculuklar ruhumu bitkin düşürdü. Crudarach'ın çocuklarını kurtarma teşebbüslerimiz ise karanlık kainatın ebedî soğuğunda nihayete erdi. Odanda Crudarach'ın bir parçasını gördüğümde bile bu işte bir parmağın olmadığına inanmak istedim. Ne kadar istesem de... Duygularıma yenik düştüm. Korku, belki de umutsuzluktu bu... Izdırap içindeydim. Hakikati keşfedemeden Sai'lanthresh'in beni bulacağından korktum."
languages.original_text: "I tried to learn to trust you, elantach. Whatever your motives, you did not turn away from me, and you helped me search for my kin. But despair ate at me from within. The human journeys through the realm of She Who Thirsts left my soul drained, and our attempts to save the children of Crudarach crumbled to nothing in the unending coldness of the dark cosmos. And even when I beheld a piece of Crudarach in your chambers, I wanted to believe you had nothing to do with it. I wanted to, but... I succumbed to emotion. To fear. To hopelessness. To grief. I was afraid that Sai'lanthresh would find me before I found the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Sana güvenmeyi öğrenmeye çalıştım elantach. Gerekçelerin ne olursa olsun bana yüz çevirmedin ve soydaşlarımı aramama yardımcı oldun. Ancak bu keder, beni içten içe yiyip bitirdi. İnsanların Susayan'ın Diyarı'na yaptıkları yolculuklar ruhumu bitkin düşürdü. Crudarach'ın Çocukları'nı kurtarma teşebbüslerimiz ise karanlık kainatın ebedî soğuğunda nihayete erdi. Odanda Crudarach'ın bir parçasını gördüğümde bile bu işte bir parmağın olmadığına inanmak istedim. Ne kadar istesem de... Duygularıma yenik düştüm. Korku, belki de umutsuzluktu bu... Izdırap içindeydim. Hakikati keşfedemeden Sai'lanthresh'in beni bulacağından korkmuştum."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
